response.job_title: LinkedIN Top Voice •I Help Good Managers Become Great Leaders•
response.summary:
I am a strategic and curious leader with 11+ years of experience in the fast-paced and dynamic industries of IT, renewable energies and security. With a unique blend of technical and commercial expertise in the B2B ecosystem, I bring valuable insights that can drive any company's growth and success. Throughout my career, I have effectively inspired and motivated cross-functional teams of up to 12 senior people, leading to the creation of winning go-to-market strategies, the closure of more than US$110M deals, and the cultivation of long-term relationships with key C-level stakeholders.

As a lifelong learner, I continuously strive to expand my technology acumen in key areas such as AI, cloud computing, cybersecurity, renewable energies, and as-a-service business models. I leverage this knowledge to devise groundbreaking, game-changing solutions that not only exceed client expectations but also contribute to my goal of making the world a better place to live.

Languages and public speaking fuel my passion > Mi lengua materna es el español, and I learnt English with my dad’s dictionary, aprendi a falar Português com os motoristas do Uber em Lisboa, et après je suis tombée amoureuse de la langue Française à Paris Odeon, adesso mi trovo in Italia a studiare, cucinare la pasta e fare scarpetta mentre 我学习汉语。活到老，学到老！
response.skills: Communication, Technical Translation, Microsoft Power BI, Access Control, Training Delivery, Presentation Skills, Electric Cars, Distribution Channel Management, Channel Relationship Management, salesforce, SALESFORCE, Business Planning, Environmental Impact Assessment, Public Speaking, Digital Marketing, Lean UX, Agile Methodologies, Service Design, Digital Transformation, Design Thinking

profile_positions.description:
As the leader of the project division within the company with P&L accountability, I created and successfully executed a comprehensive go-to-market digital strategy to establish a unique value proposition for the unit promoting Cloud, networking, cybersecurity, renewable energies, VR and services. I manage a team of 10 senior people, with whom I collaborate to develop long-term C-level relationships with channel partners, engaging decision-makers and optimizing vertical and end-user penetration. 

Using CRM and PowerBI, I review the objectives and key results for the team, creating actions plans to optimize our performance in bookings, contribution, channel development, and geographic coverage. I also co-create big deal win-plans based on Meddpicc and Blink consultative sales methodologies to ensure proper business development and smooth cooperation with other departments.
profile_positions.title: Sales Director

profile_positions.description:
I guided sales acceleration for a nationwide project team in charge large-scale accounts and high-value contracts, operating in both public and private enterprise sectors  for the surveillance, networking, access control, intrusion and software solutions. I led a team of 4 regional managers and 2 presales to drive partner engagement and empower system integrators to succeed through cutting-edge solutions, marketing tools, trainings, POCs, events, and MDF programs. 

Using Salesforce and power BI, I analyzed the team performance, motivated and accompanied each member to generate pipeline and accurate forecasts, win big deals and solve relevant business challenges through actionable plans, resulting in the exceeding of sales targets. This not only boosted customer satisfaction and built long-lasting business relationships but also enabled us to incorporate new channels and penetrate relevant end-user verticals.
profile_positions.title: Enterprise Sales Director

profile_positions.description:
I led a group of 3 senior key account managers. I was responsible for establishing strategic channel partnerships across Latam, focusing on Colombia within the security sector (surveillance, networking, access control, intrusion, and software solutions) creating awareness and alignment between stakeholders through MBRs and QBRs with: distributors, system integrators, EPCs, resellers and installers with regards to channel selling and standard operating procedures, such as: sell-in and sell-out targets (using SAP), sales forecast (using Salesforce), product introductions, pricing, reseller acquisition rate, geographic coverage, training, policies, and marketing plans.

Key Results
•	Efficiently found and established partnerships with top 3 national distributors, which today account for 70% of total country sales.
•	Exceeding annual quota by 20%, our channel team was awarded the prestigious title of “Best in Latam 2019”.
profile_positions.title: Channel Director

profile_positions.description:
I oversaw a group of 3 senior sales and presales people. My primary responsibility was to design a comprehensive go-to-market strategy for new products, which included setting up a distribution network, benchmarking, setting the pricing strategy, obtaining product certifications, overseeing project development, implementing post-sales support, and creating effective marketing plans to approach new partners and opportunities to ensure geographies and verticals penetration. Through our efforts, we were able to grow and nurture new solutions, including access control, video intercom, alarms, storage, networking, display, and smart home solutions under the EZVIZ brand.

Key Results
•	Introduced innovative new products to the Latam market, exceeding quota by 20% in 2017 and  25% in 2018.
•	Recognized as “top performer” in Latam in 2017 and named “the best contributor” in Colombia in 2018.
•	Successfully secured a US$3.5M master agreement with Sodimac and Falabella Latam for EZVIZ in 2018.
•	Pioneered the launch of Latam's first certification program for access control and video intercom in 2017. 
•	Designed and supervised the EZVIZ hot line launch in 2019.
profile_positions.title: New Business Director

profile_positions.description:
Integral member of the Renault team, responsible for the novel introduction of electrical and hybrid vehicles in Colombia at the International Motor Show in Bogota in 2012, 2014, and 2016. I provided technical guidance to customers throughout the exhibition and played a key role in converting leads to sales.

Key Results
•	Consistently recognized as “the top technical advisor” of Renault international Expo for 3 consecutive periods, 2016, 2014 and 2012.
profile_positions.title: Technical Adviser

profile_positions.description: I led the "Identification of Technology Leaps in the Automotive Industry" project. Working alongside a group of german consultants, I spearheaded market research, surveys, interviews, paper writing, and presentation building. My focus was on cutting-edge topics such as autonomous and assisted driving, vehicle-to-infrastructure communication (automotive IoT), augmented reality dashboards, AI and VR, turbochargers, superchargers, and battery-less vehicles.
profile_positions.title: Technical Researcher

profile_positions.description:
Headed the technical support unit across Latin America. Managed the resolution of complex technical problems, provided presales services, delivered certifications and trainings to system integrators, distributors and resellers in over 15 countries for access control and guard patrol systems. Conducted extensive market research to provide feedback to the R&D team in Israel, enabling new product development and customization for Latam.

Key Results
•	Successfully scoped and delivered end-to-end cross-organizational projects and met high-quality standards.
•	Conducted 37 access control certifications in the region.
profile_positions.title: Technical Support Manager

profile_positions.description: I was responsible for identifying, designing, managing, and executing project analysis of the university to determine opportunities for improvement. With a keen eye for detail, I contributed to anticipate trends and clients demand through market intelligence, conducting reviews, preparing documents, and creating presentations that clearly defined technical specifications from loosely defined business requirements, all while meeting tight deadlines.
profile_positions.title: Jr. Project engineer

profile_positions.description:
I had the privilege of teaching three courses at university: Introduction to Engineering, Digital Electronics I, and Integration Techniques. Under the guidance of the associate professor, I created and delivered engaging lesson plans, graded exams and papers, facilitated classroom discussions, and provided guidance to students in their projects. Additionally, I supervised laboratories and ensured equipment was in optimal condition. 

Key Results
•	As a result of my commitment to excellence, I was able to hold this position for 7 consecutive periods.
profile_positions.title: Teaching assistant

profile_positions.description: Responsible of providing parties with clear and exact translations of written materials, and interpretations of verbal communication, within the framework of Expo Oil & Gas in 2014 and 2013.
profile_positions.title: Jr. English-Spanish Interpreter

profile_positions.description:
Accountable of selling trusts for the real state project BD Cartagena Beach Club providing each client a detailed explanation of the project location, dimensions, quantity of buildings, pools, green zones, services provided, among others.

• Provide financial information and analytical data to the potential buyer.
• Appraise the resort using local comparisons.
• Determine best method of purchase and review financials of each client.
• Give all the necessary information related to costs, loans, financing and also profits to the
people that visited the booth.
• Create and cultivate relationships with buyers for future purchases and transactions.
profile_positions.title: Jr. Sales Executive

profile_positions.description: Responsible of providing parties with clear and exact translations of written materials, and interpretations of verbal communication, within the framework Colombia Oil and gas conference and exhibition in Cartagena.
profile_positions.title: Jr. Interpreter
